S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4097: BatchUpdateException in NullableUniqueConstraintTest
Improve error reporting when a BatchUpdateException is thrown by the client driver. Use initCause() to put the underlying exception in the chain of exceptions printed by printStackTrace(). Note that there may be more than one underlying exception for a BatchUpdateException and only one of them will be printed by printStackTrace(). To see the rest of the exceptions, getNextException() has to be used (as before).
